title: The Cadillac Hotel - Snap Special
description: At the Cadillac Hotel, an SRO in San Francisco’s Tenderloin District, a resident has gone missing. Her long time lover and best friend won’t rest until she is found.
itunes:title: The Cadillac Hotel - Snap Special
itunes:subtitle: At the Cadillac Hotel, an SRO in San Francisco’s Tenderloin District, a resident has gone missing. Her long time lover and best friend won’t rest until she is found.
